entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning early this evening and ending before morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Clearing. High minus 24.
entry.summary: Clearing. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 24. Wind chill near minus 41. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 37.
